T1.competency: Has a basic understanding of database development, different database technologies, and a basic understanding of database concepts.

examples.0: Limited experience or knowledge. May have some familiarity but no hands-on or professional experience.
examples.1: Has some experience or knowledge. Can perform with limited oversight and guidance.
examples.2: Has production-level experience and deep hands-on knowledge. Can effectively share knowledge and assist others.
examples.3: Expert-level. Fully autonomous and can deliver consistently with an exceptional degree of quality.
